Spark::SpStreamBuffer Class Reference

#include <SpStreamBuffer.h>

Collaboration diagram for Spark::SpStreamBuffer:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

A multi-format OpenGL GPU resident data buffer and render-to-texture (RTT) interface.

Definition at line 142 of file SpStreamBuffer.h.

bool SpStreamBuffer::initialize (  int  iWidth,
int  iHeight,
bool  bShareObjects = true,
bool  bCopyContext = false
) 
 

Interface:.

Call this once before use. Set bShare to true to share lists, textures, and program objects between the render texture context and the current active GL context. Definition at line 228 of file SpStreamBuffer.cpp.
